name: Monster Skater High School - Skateboarding On The School Run!
name_original: Monster Skater High School - Skateboarding On The School Run!
description:
What do you need for school? BRAINS!!!

You think brains are only for Zombies? Monsters love them too!!

But how would you get to school fast? You need to skate! Yes, you heard it right!

Collect BRAINS as you skate to get to the school fast! Watch out for the flames, you can see how close they are at bottom of the screen. Outrun those flames to get to school!

But don't let the flames from the burning buildings catch up with you or game over... just skate,
skate, skate!!

Unlock new monster characters! Complete levels collecting as many brains (mmmm... brains....) as you can!

GAME FEATURES:

‣ GREAT AND FUN APP SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES!
‣ Cool graphics!
‣ Funny and evil monsters!
‣ SPOOKY MUSIC!
‣ 100% PURE SKATEBOARDING FUN FUN FUN!!!!


Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
